main.name: I-O
main.data: You will be innovative in the development of people on a more personal basis
You will be innovative in some of the following: development of systems, patents, organizations, management or people on a less personal level
You will want to help people by working hands on and in a practical manner with them
You will want to manage or bring practical solutions to systems, organizations, management or people on a less personal level

main.name: MBTI2
main.data: Direct or indirect involvement and implementation with enough time alone
